website_summaries.verdict: While perfect for those seeking a kitchen juicer able to hide away in plain sight, serious juice drinkers should pass it up for a machine that performs better.
pros: The Omega Juice Cube neatly packs away into a compact package that's easy to store
It also slowly crushes produce to make juice without frothing or aerating
Equipped with a powerful motor, the appliance can tackle a wide variety of items including citrus, leafy greens to hard vegetables and nuts
cons: It makes less juice than ordinary horizontal slow juicers
It has more parts to keep track of and is heavy

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: so far the juicer is performing well for harder vegetables. Easy to assemble and clean. It is bit louder than expected especially when small carrots are juiced.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!!
customer_reviews.text: It works great and you get a lot of juice from the fruits and vegetables. Super easy to clean , I am looking forward to using it for other things than just juicing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: percy l. jenkinsIII

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to send this back...it appeared as if this had been a previous return as soon as I opened the box . I went ahead and unpacked the juicer only to find parts missing and the housing had cracks at the base and scratches . I went a head and ordered directly from Omega for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy V.

customer_reviews.title: Celery juice made easy!
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with juicing and it was easy to use and easy to clean! I love the machine and recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this juicer.. easy to assemble, use and clean... and I absolutely love the taste of the juice...
customer_reviews.author: tyir

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only two months then failed
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only 2 months then damaged. Don’t recommend it. We ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Handberg

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Much prefer the vertical juicer. * update ..this machine stopped working in the first two months.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: So love the compact size and that everything all fits together in it. It is reasonably quiet and easy to clean. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best ever....
customer_reviews.text: Clogs way to easily. For someone who only makes one glass of juice it would be fine. For anyone who juices as a lifestyle change, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this juicer! It’s quiet and will juice anything you want. The fiber comes out very dry and you will get a lot of juice. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy P.

customer_reviews.title: It is very good juicer with hard veggie
customer_reviews.text: It is very good juicer with hard veggie, fast for clean up too. But with soft stuffs like tomatoes, pineapple,... it doesn't make juice, it puree. It takes double time for due with the machine. You should buy it if you really want to juice hard vegetables!
customer_reviews.author: Thao N.

product_meta.title: Omega CUBE300S Cube Nutrition Center Juicer Creates Fruit Vegetable and Wheatgrass Juice Slow Masticating Compact Design with Convenient, 200-Watts, Silver
product_meta.description: The Omega juice cube. A powerful, low speed, masticating juicer and nutrition system with a square footprint and cube form factor. Create a variety of juices, plus makes nut butters, nut milks, baby food, sorbets and extrude pasta. Voltage- 110-120V
feature_bullets: INDUSTRY LEADING 15-YEAR coverage on parts and performance
HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS JUICES - Extracts the maximum amount of nutrients, vitamins, taste and juice from minimum amounts of fruits, vegetables, leafy greens, and wheatgrass.

JUICE CUBE - Powerful, low speed, masticating juicer and nutrition system with a square footprint and cube form factor uses minimal counter space. Excellent countertop appeal and a compelling industrial design.
LONGER LASTING JUICES - The Juice cube operates at a low speed of 80 RPMs that results in minimal heat buildup and oxidation, promoting healthy enzymes.
NUTRITION SYSTEM - The Juice Cube is versatile and is able to create nut butters and baby food, work as a pasta and soymilk extruder, and even serve as a grinder for coffee beans and herbs.
EXCLUSIVE - A dual stage masticating extraction for optimum yield and it automatically ejects pulp into a separate container for easy, continuous juicing.
110/120 Volt model designed exclusively for use in North America. Coverage valid in North America only

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars44 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
